channel.title: Minimum requirements for BF3
channel.description:
I'm not exactly a tech whiz, so I'll just be quick here so you guys can provide a quick answer. Specs:
AMD Radeon HD 6800 Intel Core i5-2400 CPU @ 3.10 GHz 8 GB RAM
I set the settings on low and it still runs like a cookie on a baking sheet.
Okay, bad pun. But anyway, verdict? Did I just lose $20?

item.title: Minimum requirements for BF3
item.dc:creator: Jack_Freeman
item.description:
OS: Windows Vista or Windows 7
Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Althon X2 2.7 GHz
RAM: 2GB
Graphic card: DirectX 10 or 11 compatible Nvidia or AMD ATI card, ATI Radeon 3870 or higher, Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT or higher.
Graphics card memory: 512 MB
Sound card: DirectX compatible sound card
Hard drive: 15 GB for disc version or 10 GB for digital version

https://bf3blog.com/battlefield-3-system-requirements/

Read full topic

item.title: Minimum requirements for BF3
item.dc:creator: Combine
item.description:
I’m not exactly a tech whiz, so I’ll just be quick here so you guys can provide a quick answer. Specs:

AMD Radeon HD 6800
Intel Core i5-2400 CPU @ 3.10 GHz
8 GB RAM

I set the settings on low and it still runs like a cookie on a baking sheet.

Okay, bad pun. But anyway, verdict? Did I just lose $20?
